item.title: Mcdonalds and Rs. 45 Crore Deal That Changed Its Future
item.description: Why did McDonalds spend Rs. 45 Crore on an unknown singer to sing a single melody, and how this single melody changed the course of its entire future…

item.title: Jio Meet vs Zoom | The Marketing Hack To Remember...
item.description: Even after having all the resources, why did Ambani still choose to copy? Cause he already had a brilliant marketing stunt planned. A stunt to get millions of people to talk about Jio Meet. And that too, without spending a single penny!

item.title: How To Turn A Fake 20$ to Millions!
item.description: A brilliant marketing hack by a small lawnmower company in the 19th century, which is still relevant today.
